greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n,k) = 1/k! * Sum_{i=0..k} (-1)^(k-i) *C(k,i) * A258306(n,i); triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=floor(n/2), read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..200, flattened
maple: b:= proc(x, y, t, k) option remember; `if`(y>x or y<0, 0,
+b(x-1, y, false, k) +b(x-1, y+1, true, k)))
mathematica: b[x_, y_, t_, k_] := b[x, y, t, k] = If[y > x || y < 0, 0, If[x == 0, 1, b[x - 1, y - 1, False, k]*If[t, (x + k*y)/y, 1] + b[x - 1, y, False, k] + b[x - 1, y + 1, True, k]]];
T[n_, k_] := T[n, k] = Sum[A[n, i]*(-1)^(k-i)*Binomial[k, i], {i, 0, k}]/ k!;
Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 13}, {k, 0, n/2}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 06 2018, from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 25 2015
